articles.description: The suspect has been identified in US court papers as Hargobind Tahilramani, a 41-year-old Indonesian man.

articles.author: By Ryan Smith for MailOnline
articles.title: Sean Connery's gun from first James Bond film makes $256K at auction - Daily Mail
articles.description: Weeks after his October 31st death at the age of 90, Julien's Auctions put the iconic prop under the hammer in Los Angles as part of its Icons & Idols: Trilogy sale this week.
articles.content:
The pistol used by the late Sir Sean Connery in the first ever James Bond movie - the 1962 classic Dr. No  has sold at auction for $256,000 (£190,000).
The legendary actor, who starred in seven Bond… [+7154 chars]

articles.title: Yungblud - 'Weird!' | Track-by-Track - NME
articles.description: Yungblud takes us through every track on his whirlwind new album 'Weird!', recalling how he was inspired by the Beastie Boys, Bowie and 'Get Him To The Greek...
